content: knit your own christmas tree christmas feeling came to me unbelievably early this year i am playing with various yarns to make small christmas trees to hang on the actual christmas tree put under nice hot mug of tee or hot wine or send as season greeting card to someone dear it is simple enough knitting project for beginners basic skill requirement is to be able to knit purl knit two together and cast on garter stitch knit all row is used throughout the work you will need finished christmas tree measurements about 13m dk or worsted weight yarn about 10cm/4 wide and tall in dk  about 13m dk or worsted weight but you can use any yarn as it will weight yarn yarn but you can use any yarn as affeitc tw iolln alyf ftehcet osnizlye tohfe msioztei fof  motif 3 5mm needles i used abbreviations d oub3l 5em pmo inneteeddl ebsa mi buoseod n deoeudbllees but k = knit agaipno i nutseed w bhaamtbeovoe nre yeodule lsi k beu t p = purl  again use w t ha a t p e e v s e t r r y y o n u e li e k d e l e to weave rs = right side  tapestry needle to weave in ends in ends ws = wrong side  crochet hook optional to make  crochet hook optional to k2tog = knit two together crocheted tie make crocheted tie co = cast-on note 1 be sure you are facing right side of work when start working row 1 it really doesn t matter which method you are using to cast-on as long as you have working yarn at the beginning of the right side of work to start row 1 the cast-on bumps like as for purl stitches should face wrong side and neat chain should be at right side if you don t have working yarn on right and chain on right side of your work after cast-on knit one extra row before starting to follow instructions as i had to do with long tail cast-on method used note 2 make sure you knit neat edge slip the first stitch selvedge stitch without knitting as if to knit and then leave working yarn between 1st and 2nd stitch of the row do so in all row except where mentioned otherwise in pattern note 3 knit all k2tog stitches loosely co 21 sts row 1 rs k21 row 2 ws k19 k2tog row 3 k18 k2tog row 4 k17 k2tog row 5 k16 k2tog row 6 k15 k2tog row 7 k14 k2tog row 8 k13 k2tog row 9 k12 k2tog row 10 k11 k2tog row 11 k10 k2tog row 12 k9 k2tog row 13 rs k8 k2tog co 5 sts use e-loop cast-on method row 14 k1 selvedge st p4 k7 k2tog co5 sts use e-loop cast-on row 15 k16 incl selvedge st k2tog row 16 k15 k2tog row 17 k14 k2tog
